mapper.insert: replace into t_funtime_tencent_ad (click_id, muid, click_time, appid, advertiser_id, app_type, android_id, mac, ip, user_agent, campaign_id, adgroup_id, creative_id, agent_id, deeplink_url, dest_url, device_os_type, click_sku_id, process_time, product_type, request_id, site_set, adgroup_name, oaid) values (#{clickId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{muid,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{clickTime,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{appid,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{advertiserId,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{appType,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{androidId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{mac,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{ip,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{userAgent,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{campaignId,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{adgroupId,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{creativeId,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{agentId,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{deeplinkUrl,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{destUrl,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{deviceOsType,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{clickSkuId,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{processTime,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{productType,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{requestId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{siteSet,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{adgroupName,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{oaid,jdbcType=VARCHAR})
